Headline: #55 Garfield & 1#71 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: Revised: WB 55 Garfield & 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses temp rrtd via 55th, Lake Park, 51st, Woodlawn & 55th: due to police activity near 55th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Westbound #55 Garfield and #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Lake Park, 51st, Woodlawn and 55th: due to police activity near 55th/Blackstone.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown and Harlem-Bound Green trains bypassing Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown and Harlem-Bound Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/Lake due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown and Harlem-Bound Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Clark/Lake due to police activity.

  • For Kimball-bound Brown or Harlem-bound Green service from this station, take a Loop-bound Pink train to State/Lake and transfer to a Kimball-bound Brown or Harlem-bound Green train.
  • For Kimball-bound Brown service to this station, take a Kimball-bound Brown Line train to Merchandise Mart and transfer to Loop-bound train.
  • For Harlem-bound Green service to this station, take a Harlem-bound Green train to Clinton and transfer to a 63rd-bound Green train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
